queries.query: SELECT last("memory_used") AS "memory used", last("memory_total") AS "memory total" FROM "telegraf".."nvidia_smi" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=':host:' AND "uuid"=':gpu:' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT (last("memory_used") / last("memory_total")) * 100 AS "memory capacity utilization" FROM "telegraf".."nvidia_smi" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=':host:' AND "uuid"=':gpu:' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)
